alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 3:49AM PST until December 10 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph for Ladd and Pyles canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated winds may impact travel along the I-84 corridor, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
